meanings.sent1: The baby giggled happily in the crib.
meanings.sent2: My sister is taking care of her baby.
meanings.sent3: The baby tried to eat the toy car, thinking it was food.
meanings.sent4: The baby of the family, always needing attention.
meanings.sent5: The baby's chubby cheeks were irresistible to everyone.

meanings.definition: An affectionate or endearing term for someone
meanings.sent1: Come here, baby, let me give you a hug.
meanings.sent2: She called her best friend 'baby' as a sign of love.
meanings.sent3: The cat meowed at its owner, demanding treats like a baby.
meanings.sent4: The old man was a baby when it came to technology.
meanings.sent5: The puppy's eyes were full of love as it looked at its owner, its baby.

meanings.definition: A small or miniature version of something
meanings.sent1: The toy car was a baby compared to the real one.
meanings.sent2: She carried a baby version of her favorite book in her bag.
meanings.sent3: The baby tree in the garden was just a sapling.
meanings.sent4: The baby elephant was still learning to use its trunk.
meanings.sent5: The baby cupcake was too cute to eat.

meanings.definition: A term of endearment for a romantic partner
meanings.sent1: I love you, baby, more than anything in the world.
meanings.sent2: He whispered sweet nothings to his baby under the moonlight.
meanings.sent3: The baby of my dreams, always by my side.
meanings.sent4: She was his baby, his one true love.
meanings.sent5: The stars shone brightly above them, reflecting in the eyes of his baby.
